name: Toleo
description:
Run, jump, slide, and flap your way through beautiful, hand-crafted worlds.

Toleo is designed to be fast, fluid, and fun!



Features:
  • Play as pink or blue birdboy.
  • Jump, double-jump, drop-jump, bounce, slide, slide-jump, and double-slide-jump.
  • Die to hedgehogs, birds, spikes, turrets, lava, and more.
  • Cool cutscenes.
  • 100 challenging levels in 10 unique worlds.
  • Lots of checkpoints.
  • Hard Mode with not a lot of checkpoints.
  • Speedrun Mode with on-screen timer and auto-skip cutscenes.
  • Amazing soundtrack by Tantrum Tech.
